5.5.1 components.search.provider card Provider card

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Bootstrap defines a set of all colors, as well as a smaller palette of theme colors and a set of grays.

UW Medicine brand guidelines define a smaller set of colors, which are divided into a primary and secondary palette.

Example

Primary Location

UW Neighborhood Ravenna Clinic

Lucy Hwang M.D.

Not accepting new patients

Specialties

  • Preventive medicine,
  • Primary care - family medicine,
  • Routine diabetes care,
  • Women's health

Languages

  • English,
  • Mandarin Chinese,
  • Taiwanese

Current patients: Book via eCare or call 206.520.5000.

Make an appointment
